titles.title: A bill to provide for prompt payments to small business contractors, and for other purposes.
A bill to provide for prompt payments to small business contractors, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This bill establishes a goal for payment of small business invoices by federal agencies of 15 days after receipt of a proper invoice if a specific payment date is not established by contract.
